---
title: "Report"
author: "Author"
date: "Date"
fontsize: 12pt
bibliography: references.bib
link-citations: true

output:
  html_document:
    toc: true
    toc_float: true
    toc_collapsed: false
    smooth_scroll: true
    toc_depth: 2
    number_sections: true
    theme: cerulean
    fig_caption: true
    df_print: paged

  pdf_document:
    toc: true
    toc_depth: 2
    number_sections: true
    latex_engine: xelatex
    fig_caption: true
    pandoc_args: [
      "-V", "header-includes:\\usepackage{titlesec}\\newcommand{\\sectionbreak}{\\clearpage}"
    ]

header-includes:
  - \usepackage{fontspec}
  - \setmainfont{Calibri}

editor_options:
  markdown:
    wrap: 72
---
